fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Soulread: Learn two non-King playerâ€™s names. You learn if they win with each other, influenceable. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Crucifix: Pick a target. If they do not win with you, deal 1 HP of Unblockable damage to them at the end of the phase. Influenceable. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Judgment: Pick a target. If they do not win with you, prevent them from drawing at the end of this phase. Influenceable. [2 uses, 4 CD, Unique] 
- Trinity: Make a card in your hand Upgraded, Reforged, and Satcheled. It cannot be traded. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D3]
